highlights.author: @tobi
highlights.summary: Pi agent harness - foundation of Clawdbot, self-modifying agent that writes its own plugins. Dawn of malleable software.

highlights.author: @RileyRalmuto
highlights.summary: Memory Ledger Protocol for OpenClaw - confidence scores, structured memory types, question generation, identity layer. True memory vs fancy logging.

highlights.author: @RileyRalmuto
highlights.summary: MLP repo released - drop-in skills for Claude Code and OpenClaw. Reflection engine costs $0.10-0.30 per session.

highlights.author: @DataChaz
highlights.summary: Composio Awesome-Claude-Skills repo - 100s of ready workflows: PDF, Playwright, AWS, MCP builders. Free + open source.

highlights.author: @bloggersarvesh
highlights.summary: Claude Cowork for local SEO - claims to outrank competitors in 60 days.

highlights.author: @tomcrawshaw01
highlights.summary: Lead gen agency disruption - single AI agent replacing $5k/month agencies. Directly relevant to SLC lead gen.

topActionItems: Clone Memory Ledger Protocol repo and evaluate for Claw integration
Check Composio Awesome-Claude-Skills for useful skills
Research Pi architecture for self-modifying agent patterns
Evaluate git worktrees for parallel project work
